title: Walk Awhile
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 108 words, Level E (Grade 1), Lexile 300L, Fiction Series
description: Will and Whitney have been walking together all their lives, from the wheat fields of childhood to the slow stroll of old age. Walk Awhile is a charming story that helps teach students about the consonant /w/ and /wh/ digraph sounds. This book can also be used to teach students how to identify the author's purpose as well as how to recognize and use question marks.
meta: awhile, ready, together, wheat, whiskers, whistle
Question Marks : Recognize and use question marks
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words they, to, want
